book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Di ba nɛ beŋ hɛɛ-la taŋ-la niaa síi na, fawulluŋ jaŋ kɛŋba. Ba jaŋ chiŋ di-bolii a bibenu a bul, Ou, ou ta-baliŋ deeŋ, ta-bal-la ba síi yirɛ Babilↄŋ, u bi diene ka ba dↄgisɛ u niaa ba suu.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Dunia bayalaa yiyel Babilↄŋ niaa wiaa, bɛɛ wiaa nuu-kala tuo a biraa yↄↄ ba kiaa.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Kialiŋ ba síi yallɛ nɛ ŋla: Sɛlimɛ, hↄↄŋ, tabii-tulaa, gɛri-yuoli-zↄŋŋↄↄ, muↄlaa, gɛripɛ-fula-fula biisiŋ, gɛripɛ-fiɛsiŋ, ari daasi-la kala yalliŋ si hɛyɛ, ari kialiŋ kala ba si kɛŋ batuŋ nyilaa ŋaa, ari kialiŋ kala ba si kɛŋ daa-la yalliŋ si hɛyɛ saa, ari kↄliiŋ, ari kialiŋ ba si kɛŋ hↄↄŋ ŋaa, ari lokuŋbuiaa.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ku-suↄ-siŋ ba si joŋo guoli kudiilee tuↄŋ u siŋ, tulaaliba, tii-keliŋ suↄra si sima, si-duoruŋ, nuuŋ, muŋ-zↄmuŋ, folimiaa, nɛsiŋ, ari piesee, ari janiŋ, ari janiŋ torukoba, ari yosuŋ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ ba bira bul a tigɛ taŋ-la niaa lɛ, Ku-zↄmↄ-la kala ma fa síi hiɛnu, ma telba kala lɛ, ma ku-zↄŋ-zↄŋ-na kala ari ma sima-la kala ma fa síi nii, ba bira tuo. Ma bira bi jaŋ kↄ di ma naba.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Bayalia-la kala fa si yallɛ kiaa pi Babilↄŋ niaa a na moribiee, ba jaŋ fá fawulluŋ a tiŋ hɛɛ-la wiaa Babilↄŋ niaa síi na. Ba kala jaŋ chiŋ di-bolii a faasa ŋmoo niiŋ a yele bubul,

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ou, ou, ta-baliŋ deeŋ fa zↄmↄ a kɛŋ ku-zↄŋŋↄↄ maa. U niaa fa lilaalɛ gɛri-yuoli-zↄŋŋↄↄ, ari muↄlaa, ari gɛri-fiɛsiŋ, a lilaalɛ sɛlimɛ ari tabii-tulaa.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: U bi diene ka kiaa deeŋba kala chei ŋ teeŋ. Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ síi duori liiŋ dabori-bala-la síi vɛŋ mugi-baliŋ tuↄŋ kuhiasiŋ, ari nialiŋ síi tiŋ daboro-la tuↄŋ, ari nialiŋ síi juu liiŋ daborusuŋ aa mu leree, ari nialiŋ kala si chɛ kiaa mugi-baliŋ tuↄŋ di ba na moribiee,

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: niaa deeŋba kala chiŋ di-bolii nɛ a bibeŋ. Ba na Babilↄŋ duu dii nyiniŋ. Ŋii nɛ ba ŋmoo niiŋ a yel a bul, Ta bɛɛ nɛ fa nagɛ ta-baliŋ deeŋ?

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ ba yel a ŋaa hagila hihɛ ba nyusuŋ lɛ a bul, Ou, ou, ta-baliŋ deeŋ lɛ nɛ nialiŋ kala fa si kɛŋ liiŋ daborusuŋ to a jigi. Má bee na, u bi diene ka kialiŋ kala u fa si kɛnɛ chei.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ma nialiŋ si hɛ Wia-jaŋ lɛ, má jujuↄsɛ Babilↄŋ wiaa. Ma Wia niaa ari Wia naŋzↄↄba ari nialiŋ fa síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zↄŋ-la doluŋ lɛ, má jujuↄsɛ. Wia joŋ ma chimiŋ a joŋo t_iŋ Babilↄŋ nɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaara dↄŋↄ, u dolie nɛ woruŋ, u joŋ tabii-bal a joŋo yuo hɛ mugi-baliŋ lɛ. Tabii-la fa yuga a nagɛ nↄmuŋ nɛ. U si joŋ tabii-bal-la a yuo ŋii, u bul, Ŋii titia nɛ ba jaŋ ŋaa Babilↄŋ. Ba jaŋ joŋ Babilↄŋ, ta-bal-la a yuo ta ari doluŋ. U jaŋ lɛl dunia lɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ba bira bi jaŋ nii cheŋ-duduuroo di baa d_u, ŋmuluŋ ŋmiiraa ma bira bi jaŋ ŋmuŋmuu. Saaraa ari gɛripɛ-yuoroo ma jaŋ bira tuo u lɛ. Niaa bira bi jaŋ nunↄŋ munuŋ u lɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Chaanaa ma bira bi jaŋ chaanɛ u tuↄŋ. Baalaa ari haalaa bira bi jaŋ jaa dↄŋↄ. Babilↄŋ bayalaa nɛ fa ŋaa ni-balaa dunia deeŋ lɛ, aŋ ka ba kɛŋ daalusuŋ aa ŋaa wu-bↄŋŋↄↄ aa nyisɛ dunia niaa kala.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Babilↄŋ lɛ nɛ ba kpu nialiŋ fa síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zↄŋ-la doluŋ lɛ, a kpu Wia niaa maa, a bira kpu nialiŋ dↄŋsuŋ si hɛ dunia lɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Wiaa deeŋba kala si ŋaa hariŋ, ŋii nɛ mi nii goŋ Wia-jaŋ lɛ. Goŋ-la nagɛ ni-daŋ yiikoroo nɛ aa bul wiaa. Ba si, Haleluya, la Tiina Wia kɛŋ doluŋ duu laala ta. U nɛ kɛŋ yiriŋ ari doluŋ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Má leŋ di la dɛnnu, bɛɛ wiaa u kɛŋ wutitii nɛ a kaa dii niaa sariya. U dii ha-chↄruŋ-bal-la sariya. Ha-chↄruŋ-bal-la nɛ faa ŋaa wu-liiliŋ, a chei dunia niaa kala. U si kpu Wia tiŋtinnaa ŋii, ŋii titia nɛ Wia ma dↄgisu.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ ba bira heele bul, Haleluya, nyiŋ-la síi dii haal-la, u nyuↄsuŋ nɛ jil wia nyuŋ a kaa mu wuu.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ nihiasiŋ mara ari banɛsɛ-la ari kialiŋ banɛsɛ si weye tuu kpirimi a chuↄlɛ Wia. U fa hↄŋ u kuori-kpasa nyuŋ nɛ. Ŋii nɛ ba bul, Ami, Haleluya!

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ nuu yiikoro lii Wia kuori-kpasa-la sɛmɛ a heele bul, Ma Wia tiŋtinnaa kala ari ma nialiŋ kala síi fáu, nihiasiŋ ari haŋbiisiŋ kala, má leŋ di la dɛnnɛ Wia. U nɛ tiila.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ mi bira nii ni-daŋ yiikoro. Yiikori-la fa nagɛ fuo-balaa síi pɛllu nɛ gbul gbul. U bira nagɛ duonuŋ síi kpia ŋmana ŋmana aŋ pɛ liligisɛ. Ŋii nɛ yiikori-la heele bul, Haleluya, la Tiina Wia Wii-jaribakↄ dii u kuoruŋ nɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Má leŋ di la jujuↄsɛ a yirɛ u yiri-baliŋ a dɛnnu woruŋ. Bua-la Pie-bie-la si jaŋ jaa haala yie nɛ. Haal-la ma si jaŋ jaau ŋaa siri nɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ba joŋ gɛri-yuoli-zↄŋ a laalɛ haal-la. Gɛri-la tula zↄmↄ. Kuŋ-kala tuo u lɛ. Gɛri-yuoli-zↄŋ-la haal-la si laala ŋaa Wia niaa tuↄ-pul wu-ŋaalaa nɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaari-la bula pimi a bul, Ŋmuŋsɛ wiiŋ deeŋ, ari Wia jaŋ pɛ nialiŋ ba si yira di ba ku gbieli Pie-bie-la ha-jaari gbiele a dii kudiilee dimɛ. Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaari-la bula pimi a bul di Wia niiŋ wu-tɛŋŋɛ nɛ ŋii.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ mi tuu kpirimi di mi chuↄlu, ama u bula pimi di mi sí ŋii ŋaa, di la kala ŋaa tiŋtinnaa a tima pipi Wia, la di nialiŋ kala síi to wialiŋ Yesu si bula. Ŋii nɛ u bula pimi di mi chuↄlɛ Wia. Di nialiŋ kala síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zↄŋ-la doluŋ lɛ, wialiŋ titia nɛ Yesu dagɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ mi na Wia-jaŋ duu suro. Mi beŋ a na ja-pula di nuu jila. Nii-la si jila yiriŋ nɛ Ni-tɛŋŋɛ ari Wutitii Tiina. U dii niaa sariya ari wutitii, a kɛŋ wutitii ma yuo laaliŋ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: U siaa kala chuchol a nagɛ nyiŋ-geliŋ, aŋ ka u chu kuori-nyuŋ-chuuluŋ a yugɛ. Ba ŋmuŋsɛ u yiriŋ hɛ nyuŋ-chuulu-la lɛ. Nuu-kala bi yiri-la jiŋ see u titia.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: U laalɛ gɛri-la chaliŋ si misa nɛ. Ba kɛŋ nii-la kaa yirɛ Wia Niiŋ Wiaa.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Wia-jaŋ laali-yuoroo ma laalɛ gɛri-fula-fula biisiŋ nɛ. Ba ma jil ja-pulluŋ a tuto u hariŋ nɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ tokobiiŋ lii nii-la si jil jaaba niiŋ lɛ a ku lii, a kɛŋ niiŋ woruŋ nyagaga. Tokobii-la nɛ u jaŋ kaa ta dunia niaa kala kpu. U jaŋ kɛŋ kpaasa a kaa beŋ dunia niaa. La Tiina Wia Wii-jaribakↄ kɛŋ baaniŋ nɛ dunia niaa nyuŋ. U baaniŋ jaŋ sii ba nyuŋ woruŋ. Niaa chaliŋ jaŋ lii ari ba si yie chagɛ tii-nɛnɛɛ liiŋ ŋii.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ba ŋmuŋsɛ u yiriŋ nɛ a hɛ gɛri-duduoŋ-la u si laala lɛ ari u naapuiŋ lɛ. U yiriŋ nɛ ŋla: Kuoroo kala Kuoro ari la tiinaba kala Tiina.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ aŋ ka mi na Wia tiŋdaaru kubala duu chiŋ wii-pↄsuŋ lɛ. Ŋii nɛ u faasa yirɛ diibiisi-la kala síi f_il wia nyuŋ di-bolii di ba ku pɛ dↄŋↄ lɛ a dii kudiile-la Wia si jaŋ joŋo piba. Kudiile-la jaŋ yugɛ lee-la.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: U yirɛba di ba ku dii kuoroo namia, ari laali-yuori-hiasiŋ namia, ari ni-duoruŋ namia, ari janiŋ namia, ari nialiŋ si jila namia, ari nuhuobiine namia, nialiŋ si tii ba titia ari nialiŋ si ŋaa yosuŋ, ari nihiasiŋ ari haŋbiisiŋ kala.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ mi na baga ku-la ari dunia kuoroo ari ba laali-yuoroo di ba hilime di ba yuo nii-la si jil jↄↄ-la ari u laali-yuoroo.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Nii-la si jil jↄↄ-la ari u laali-yuoroo yuo dii baga ku-la a kɛnu. Ba bira kɛŋ nii-la si nyia wiaa ari uu bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zↄŋ-la doluŋ lɛ. U nɛ fa ŋaa wu-magilaa baga ku-la sipaaŋ a wuo nyisɛ nialiŋ ba si kɛŋ baga ku-la yiriŋ magilɛba, ari nialiŋ síi chuↄlɛ baga ku-la nagisiŋ ba si mɛ bil. Ba joŋ niaa deeŋba baliamiŋ a yuo ta ba ku tuu juu Wia nyiniŋ, nyiŋ-la síi dii a nagɛ jiribiiŋ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ka nii-la si jil jↄↄ-la kɛŋ tokobii-la si lii u niiŋ lɛ kaa kpu ni-kaanaa. Diibiisiŋ loriki ba naŋpiliŋ kala.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ mi na Wia tiŋdaara duu lii Wia-jaŋ a ku tuu tiŋteeŋ, a kori buↄtuo-luŋii-la boribiiŋ ari chↄruŋ-bal kubala.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ u kɛŋ diŋ-la, diŋ-la fa si hɛ dimɛ buŋbuŋ, a vↄbu bil jisiŋ bui. Diŋ-la nɛ ŋaa Sitaani.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaari-la joŋ diŋ-la a yuo hɛ buↄtuo-la lɛ a kaa tↄ, a magilɛ buↄtuo-la niiŋ, di nuu sí wuo kaa suri. Ba kɛŋ diŋ-la kaa tↄ duu bira sí dunia niaa nyisu, see di jisiŋ bui-la bala. Di jisiŋ bui-la nɛ bala, ba jaŋ kɛnu puri muapilii.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ mi na kuori-kpasinniŋ di niaa hↄŋ ba nyuŋ. Niaa deeŋba nɛ Wia piba doluŋ di ba dii dunia niaa sariya. Ŋii nɛ aŋ ka mi na niaa diŋsiŋ. Niaa deeŋba nɛ faa bul wutitii-la Yesu fa si daga a pi niaa, aŋ pɛɛ bul Wia niiŋ wiaa. Ŋii nɛ ba kpuba a keri ba nyusuŋ. Niaa deeŋba-na fa bi baga ku-la ka chuↄlɛ nɛ. Ba bi ku-la ba si mɛ u nagu maa chuↄlɛ. Ba bi baga ku-la magiliŋ kɛnɛ ba tilliŋ lɛ koo ba nisaa lɛ. Niaa deeŋba suba, ama ba sii suuŋ lɛ di ba di Kirisito dii kuoruŋ a beŋ dunia niaa jisiŋ bui.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Nialiŋ si laa sipaaŋ sii suuŋ lɛ nɛ ŋla. Nialiŋ si suba, ni-kaanaa bi jaŋ sii suuŋ lɛ, see di jisiŋ bui-la yie.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Nialiŋ si laa sipaaŋ sii suuŋ lɛ, ba bi disinniŋ kɛnɛ. Wia jaŋ pɛba lɛ. Niaa deeŋba suu bala nɛ. Ba bira bi jaŋ suu. Suu-lia-la ma bi jaŋ wuoba. Ba jaŋ chiŋ Wia ari Kirisito sipaaŋ a laa niaa nyuŋ a tima piba. Ba di Kirisito jaŋ beŋ dunia niaa jisiŋ bui.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Di jisiŋ bui-la nɛ kiele, ba jaŋ liisɛ Sitaani sarika-la lɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: U jaŋ ku lii a nyisɛ dunia niaa si hɛ tiŋteeŋ sɛmɛ-na kala lɛ di ba yuo laaliŋ. Gↄg ari Magↄg niaa nɛ ŋii. Ba yuga a magɛ fuoŋ niiŋ hagili-buŋbuguloo nɛ mɛmɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Gↄg ari Magↄg niaa jaŋ duurɛ dunia kala a mu golli lee-la Wia niaa si hɛ, ari taŋ-la Wia si cho. Ŋii nɛ nyiniŋ lii wia nyuŋ a ku tuu dii ba kala.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Sitaani nɛ nyisɛ Gↄg ari Magↄg niaa hɛ di ba yuo Wia niaa. Ŋii nɛ ba joŋu a yuo hɛ nyiniŋ síi dii a nagɛ jiribiiŋ lɛ. Baga ku-la ari nii-la si nyia wiaa ari uu bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zↄŋ-la doluŋ lɛ, ma hɛ dimɛ. Ba jaŋ na hɛɛŋ wiihɛyɛ ari titaŋiŋ kala a kaa mu wuu.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ ka mi na kuori-kpasi-bal ku-pula duu china. Nuu nɛ hↄŋ u nyuŋ. Ŋii nɛ mi na di tiŋteeŋ ari wia nyuŋ kala lɛlɛ nii-la siiŋ lɛ. Ba bira bi lee kɛnɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ ka mi na nialiŋ si suba, nihiasiŋ ari haŋbiisiŋ kala, di ba chiŋ kuori-kpasa-la sipaaŋ. Ŋii nɛ ba suri tenniŋ yugɛ, a bira suri teniŋ dↄŋↄ. Miisiŋ teniŋ nɛ ŋii. Nialiŋ si kɛŋ miisiŋ Wia teeŋ yiraa nɛ hɛ u tuↄŋ. Tenni-la dↄŋsuŋ lɛ nɛ ba ŋmuŋsɛ nuu-kala si hɛ dunia lɛ wu-ŋaalaa hɛ. Nuu-kala si ŋaa wiaa magɛ ŋii nɛ, ba jaŋ beŋ a t_imu.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ mugi-baliŋ kɛŋ nialiŋ kala si suu u tuↄŋ ku lii. Nialiŋ kala ma si hɛ lɛlɛɛ-jaŋ ari Wia nyiniŋ tuↄŋ, ba kala ku lii. Ŋii nɛ ba beŋ tenni-la tuↄŋ a na wialiŋ kala ba si ŋaa dunia lɛ a dii ba sariya.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ ba joŋ suuŋ ari lɛlɛɛ-jaŋ a yuo hɛ nyiŋ-bal-la lɛ. Nii-la kala si jaŋ juu nyiŋ-bal-la tuↄŋ, u suu-liamiŋ nɛ ŋii.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Di nuu-kala yiriŋ nɛ tuo miisiŋ teŋ-la tuↄŋ, ba yie joŋu yuo hɛ nyiŋ-bal-la tuↄŋ nɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ mi na Wia-jaŋ ku-falii ari tiŋtee-falii. Buŋbuŋ kialaa kala dɛrɛ nɛ. Mugi-baliŋ kala tuo tiŋtee-falii-la lɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ mi na ta-falii-la Wia si ŋaa di u lii Wia-jaŋ a ku tuu tiŋteeŋ. Taŋ-la baa yiru Jerusalɛm nɛ. U bi disinniŋ kɛnɛ. Wia kpiɛru ari ba si yie kpiɛrɛ haala ŋii a kaa mu pi u bala.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ aŋ ka mi nii nuu yiikoro duu lii kuori-kpasa-la sɛmɛ a faasa bul di má bee na, lɛɛlɛ Wia kↄ nuhuobiine teeŋ nɛ. U jaŋ hↄŋ ba tuↄŋ. Ba nɛ jaŋ ŋaa u niaa. U titia jaŋ hↄŋ ba teeŋ a ŋiŋaa ba Wia.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: U jaŋ fiisɛ ba sii-liiriŋ kala ta. Ba bira bi jaŋ suu, ba tuↄŋ bira bi jaŋ chei. Ba bira bi jaŋ yel a bira bi jaŋ na hɛɛŋ, bɛɛ wiaa wu-binia-la kala bala nɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ nii-la si hↄŋ kuori-kpasa-la nyuŋ bul di má bee na, mi ŋaa kuŋ-kala birimɛ ku-falii nɛ. Ŋii nɛ u bira bula pimi di mi ŋmuŋsɛ wiaa deeŋba u si bula, bɛɛ wiaa ba kala ŋaa wutitii nɛ. Niaa jaŋ wuo laaba dii.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ u bula pimi a bul, Wii-kala dɛrɛ nɛ. Mi nɛ ŋaa Alifa ari Omega. Mi nɛ ŋaa nii-la fa si hɛ dimɛ buŋbuŋ ari nii-la si jaŋ hɛ dimɛ dunia didɛriŋ. Nii-la kala lii-nyuasuŋ si kɛnɛ, mi jaŋ ŋaa lii-la si pi niaa miisiŋ pu pɛi.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Nii-la kala si wuo yuo dii Sitaani jaŋ na kiaa deeŋba kala. Mi jaŋ ŋaa u Wia, u ma jaŋ ŋaa mi bii.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ama nialiŋ si ŋaa fawuluba, ari nialiŋ si bi yarida kɛnɛ, ari disiŋ ŋaaraa, ari ni-kpuuraa, ari nialiŋ síi ŋaa wu-liiliŋ, ari nialiŋ si kɛŋ daalusuŋ aa ŋaa wu-bↄŋŋↄↄ, ari vui-kpaaraa, ari nialiŋ kala síi nyia wiaa, ba jaŋ joŋba hɛ nyiniŋ síi dii a nagɛ jiribiiŋ. Ba jaŋ suu suu-liamiŋ nyiŋ-la tuↄŋ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaaraa balipɛ-la si kori gbaŋsiŋ balipɛ-la si suo ari nyanyal-bↄmↄ-la balipɛ ku bula pimi di mi kↄ, duu dagɛmi haal-la Pie-bie-la si jaŋ jaa.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ Wia Diŋ-zↄŋ-la ku hɛmi lɛ, ka u joŋmi kaa jil peel-bal kubala nyuŋ. U leŋie nɛ woruŋ. Ŋii nɛ u dagɛmi taŋ-la si bi disinniŋ kɛnɛ baa yirɛ Jerusalɛm. Wia leŋ u lii Wia-jaŋ kuu tuu tiŋteeŋ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Taŋ-la pullɛ ari Wia si pullɛ ŋii, a tutul ari naŋkpachil-zↄŋŋↄↄ ŋ si bi na tɛtɛ, a bira tutul ari tabiiŋ si nagɛ beenaŋtirɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Taŋ-la kɛŋ kɛrɛ-bal kubala. U leŋie nɛ woruŋ a kɛŋ boiŋniiriŋ fii ari balia a golli. Wia tiŋdaaraa fii ari balia chiŋ boye-la lɛ, ka ba ŋmuŋsɛ Iziral naabalimaba fii ari balia-la yiraa hɛ boye-la lɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Taŋ-bubuↄŋ ari taŋ-nyuŋ kɛŋ boyee batori batori, ta-sɛsiŋ ma kɛŋ batori batori.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Kɛrɛ-la geŋtine ba bil tabiaa fii ari balia nɛ. Tabia-la lɛ ba ŋmuŋsɛ Pie-bie-la naŋzↄↄba fii ari balia-la yiraa nɛ hɛba lɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Wia tiŋdaari-la si bul wiaa mi teeŋ kori sɛlimɛ daaŋ nɛ duu kaa magisɛ ta-bal-la ari u boiŋniiri-la ari u kɛrɛsiŋ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Taŋ-la jaliŋ ari u duomuŋ kala magɛ dↄŋↄ nɛ. Ŋii nɛ u magisɛ taŋ-la ari sɛlimɛ daa-la duu ŋaa meel-daasiŋ bui ari zↄ-banↄŋ. U duomuŋ ari u jaliŋ ari u leŋiŋ kala magɛ dↄŋↄ nɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Wia tiŋdaari-la magisɛ taŋ-la kɛrɛ-la ma nɛ. U leŋiŋ ŋaa naakieliŋ mahiŋ batori ari fii ari balia nɛ. Nuhuobiine síi magisɛ kiaa, ŋii titia nɛ Wia tiŋdaari-la ma magisɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ba kɛŋ tabii-pulluŋ nɛ saa kɛrɛ-la, aŋ ka taŋ-la kala ŋaa sɛlimɛ, a kala chaanɛ a nagɛ beenaŋtirɛ. Kuŋ-kala tuo u lɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Taŋ-la kɛrɛ-la geŋtine-la tabiaa kala ŋaa tabii-zↄmↄ nɛ a tutul. Buŋbuŋ kua yiriŋ nɛ jasipa, liamiŋ kua ma yiriŋ nɛ saafaya, torimuŋ kua ma yiriŋ nɛ agɛt, nɛsɛmiŋ kua ma yiriŋ nɛ ɛmɛralidi,

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: nↄŋ kua yiriŋ nɛ ↄnis, dumuŋ kua yiriŋ nɛ kaanɛliaŋ, pɛmiŋ kua yiriŋ nɛ kirasↄlati, chorimuŋ kua ma ŋaa bɛril, nibimiŋ kua ma yiriŋ nɛ topas, fiimiŋ kua yiriŋ nɛ kirasↄpilis, fii ari kuŋ kua yiriŋ nɛ jasinis, ka fii ari baliamiŋ kua nɛ yiriŋ nɛ amɛtis.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Boye-la fii ari balia kala ŋaa tabii-tulaa nɛ. Boi-kala ŋaa tabii-tulii kubala nɛ. Taŋ-la woŋbiiŋ ŋaa sɛlimɛ nɛ, kuŋ-kala tuo u lɛ a kala tutul ari beenaŋtirɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ mi beŋ taŋ-la tuↄŋ a bi Wia-dia kala na dimɛ. Taŋ-la niaa níi chuↄlɛ la Tiina Wia Wii-jaribakↄ ari Pie-bie-la lee-kala. Ba Wia-dia nɛ ŋii.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Taŋ-la bira bi wii-pↄsuŋ ari chɛnɛ ka chɛ, bɛɛ wiaa Wia tula nɛ ŋaa ba pulumuŋ. Pie-bie-la nɛ ŋaa ba chaaniŋ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: U pulumuŋ lɛ nɛ dunia niaa kala jaŋ vɛŋ. Ka dunia kuoroo kala jaŋ kɛŋ ba ku-zↄŋŋↄↄ kaa juu dimɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ba bi jaŋ kɛŋ taŋ-la boyee kaa tↄ wiihɛyɛ. Titaŋiŋ paala tuo dimɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Tiŋteyee niaa kala jaŋ kɛŋ ba ku-zↄŋŋↄↄ ari ba kuori kiaa kaa juu dimɛ,

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: ama kuŋ-kala si kɛŋ disinniŋ, koo nii-la kala si ŋaa ni-bↄŋ, koo wu-nyiaru kala bi jaŋ juu taŋ-la, see nialiŋ Pie-bie-la si ŋmuŋsɛ ba yiraa hɛ miisiŋ teŋ-la lɛ nɛ jaŋ juu dimɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaari-la bira dagɛmi fuo kubala. Fuo-la liiŋ níi pi niaa miisiŋ. Lii-la kala pulla chila chila a nagɛ beenaŋtirɛ. Lii-la pɛllɛ lii Wia ari Pie-bie-la kuori-kpasa-la teeŋ nɛ,

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: a pɛllɛ to ta-bal-la tutuↄbaaniŋ, ka tiisi-la si kɛŋ nɛnɛɛ síi pi niaa miisiŋ chiŋ fuo-la cholluŋ balia-la kala. Tiisi-la yie nɛŋ nɛŋ-yiriba, baa tↄrɛ chɛnɛ kala. Tiisi-la pipaariŋ nɛ ba kaa vivaarɛ tiŋteye-la niaa.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Kuŋ-na kala Wia síi ŋmiɛsa hɛu lɛ tuo ta-bal-la tuↄŋ. Ama Wia kuori-kpasa ari Pie-bie-la kpasa jaŋ hɛ lee-la, ka u tiŋtinnaa chuↄlu.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ba jaŋ na u siaa, ka u yiriŋ hɛ ba tilliŋ lɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Taŋ bi jaŋ biri dimɛ. Ba bi chaaniŋ koo wii-pↄsuŋ pulumuŋ chɛ dimɛ. La Tiina Wia nɛ jaŋ ŋaa ba pulumuŋ. Ba nɛ jaŋ beŋ dunia a kaa mu wuu.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaari-la bira bula pimi di wiaa deeŋba ŋaa wutitii nɛ, di niaa jaŋ wuo laaba dii. Di la Tiina Wia, nii-la si joŋ u Diŋ-zↄŋ-la a pi nialiŋ síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zↄŋ-la doluŋ lɛ nɛ timu duu ku bul wialiŋ si jaŋ ŋaa lɛɛlɛ a pi u tiŋtinnaa.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Yesu si, Má bee na, mi jaŋ kↄ lɛɛlɛ. Nialiŋ síi to wialiŋ ba si bula Wia Diŋ-zↄŋ-la doluŋ lɛ a hɛ teniŋ deeŋ tuↄŋ, Wia jaŋ pɛba lɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Mi-na Jↄↄŋ, mi nɛ nii-la si nia aŋ pɛ na wiaa deeŋba kala. Mi si nia aŋ naba ŋii, mi tuu kpirimi Wia tiŋdaari-la sipaaŋ, nii-la si dagɛmi wiaa deeŋba kala, a chuↄlu.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ u bula pimi di mi sí ŋii ŋaa, di la kala ŋaa tiŋtinnaa a tima pipi Wia, la di nialaa kala síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zↄŋ-la doluŋ lɛ, ari nialiŋ kala síi to wialiŋ si hɛ teniŋ deeŋ tuↄŋ. U bula pimi di mi chuↄlɛ Wia.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ u bira bula pimi di mi sí wiaa deeŋba ba si bula Wia Diŋ-zↄŋ-la doluŋ lɛ a hɛ teniŋ deeŋ lɛ kaa faa. U bi jaŋ dieni, ka wialiŋ ba si bula ŋaa.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii wiaa má leŋ di ni-bↄŋŋↄↄ kɛŋ ŋii naaŋ lɛ a ŋiŋaa wu-bↄŋŋↄↄ, di nialiŋ si kɛŋ disinniŋ ma kɛŋ ŋii naaŋ lɛ a ŋiŋaa disinniŋ, di ni-zↄŋŋↄↄ ma kɛŋ ŋii naaŋ lɛ a ŋiŋaa wu-zↄŋŋↄↄ, di tuↄ-pul tiŋŋaa ma kɛŋ ŋii naaŋ lɛ a ŋiŋaa tuↄ-pul wiaa.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Yesu si, Má bee na, mi jaŋ kↄ lɛɛlɛ, mi jaŋ ku t_iŋ nuu-kala. Nuu-kala si tima magɛ ŋii, ŋii titia nɛ u jaŋ laa u time.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Mi nɛ ŋaa Alifa ari Omega, mi nɛ ŋaa nii-la fa si hɛ dimɛ buŋbuŋ ari nii-la si jaŋ hɛ dimɛ dunia didɛriŋ. Mi nɛ ŋaa di-suomuŋ, mi nɛ ŋaa di-dɛriŋ maa.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Nialiŋ síi to Wia wiaa, Wia jaŋ pɛba lɛ di ba wuo na woŋbiiŋ a to ta-bal-la boiŋniiree juu, a wuo dii tia-la síi pi niaa miisiŋ nɛnɛɛ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ama ni-bↄŋŋↄↄ jaŋ chiŋ taŋ-la jeeŋ hariŋ. Nialiŋ wu-ŋaalaa si nagɛ vahiŋ, ari nialiŋ si kɛŋ daalusuŋ a ŋiŋaa wu-bↄŋŋↄↄ, ari nialiŋ síi ŋaa wu-liiliŋ, ari nialiŋ síi kpu niaa, ari vui-kpaaraa, ari nialiŋ kala si cho wu-nyiariŋ aa nyia wiaa, ba kala jaŋ chiŋ taŋ-la jeeŋ hariŋ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ Yesu si, Mi nɛ tiŋ mi tiŋdaara duu kↄ ma teeŋ a bul wiaa deeŋba pi nialiŋ si laa Yesu wiaa dii a hihilimi lee-na kala. Mi ŋaa Devit dia niaa geŋtine nɛ aŋ pɛ ŋaa Devit doho nuu. Mi nɛ ŋaa nanyualuŋ.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Ŋii nɛ Wia Diŋ-zↄŋ-la ari haal-la Pie-bie-la síi chɛ duu jaa bula pi niaa a bul, Má kↄ. Nuu-kala si nia, má leŋ duu kↄ. Nuu-na kala lii-nyuasuŋ si kɛnɛ, uu kↄ. Nii-la kala si cho duu nyua lii-la síi pi niaa miisiŋ aŋ sí kuŋ-kala t_iŋ, uu kↄ a nyua lii-la.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Mi-na Jↄↄŋ chɛ di nuu-kala si nii wiaa deeŋba ba si bula hɛ teniŋ deeŋ tuↄŋ, di ba kɛŋ ba titia woruŋ ari wiaa deeŋba lɛ. Di nuu-kala nɛ kɛŋ wii pɛ wiaa deeŋba lɛ, Wia ma jaŋ joŋ nyanyal-bↄmↄ-la ba si daga teniŋ deeŋ tuↄŋ a dↄgisɛ u tiina.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Di nuu-kala ma nɛ liisɛ wiaa deeŋba kuŋ ta, Wia ma jaŋ liisɛ u tiina ta. U bi jaŋ puu woŋbiiŋ duu na kialiŋ ba si ŋmuŋsa hɛ teniŋ deeŋ tuↄŋ. U tiina bi jaŋ wuo dii tia-la síi pi niaa miisiŋ nɛnɛɛ. U bira bi jaŋ juu taŋ-la Wia si liisa tuↄŋ maa.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: Nii-la síi dagɛ wiaa deeŋba Wia si dagu bul duu kↄ nɛ lɛɛlɛ. La Tiina Yesu, kↄ. Ami.

book_name: WIALIŊ WIA SI JOŊO DAGƐ JƆƆŊ
verse_text: La Tiina Yesu lahↄrimↄ lɛ, Wia niaa kala jaŋ hↄŋ ari yarifiɛlaa. Ami.
